refnamediv.refpurpose: Container for a person's previous (and possibly current) jobs

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The history element contains a person's job history (the jobs that they have worked at in the past). It is also common to include their current job in this element.

refsect2.title: Parents
refsect2.para: history may be contained in these elements:
